title: News: Action Bronson, A$AP Rocky, Nas & more added to SXSW 2012 lineup
content:
It’s all going to kick off at this year’s South by Southwest.

The organisers of the Texan festival have confirmed that hip-hop legend Nas and upcoming rappers A$AP Rocky and Action Bronson will play at this year’s event.

With only three weeks to go before SXSW, the lineup is taking shape and a impressive range of hip-hop acts are set to perform across the ten day music festival including Nas, Schoolboy Q, Kendrick Lamar, El-P, Murs, Wiz Khalifa, Juicy J, GZA, A$AP Rocky, B.O.B., Action Bronson, T.I., Big K.R.I.T., Curren$y and Mobb Deep.

You can check out the full SXSW lineup on the official SXSW schedule.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d40
